p:
In this research, the required treatments were based on five coating formulations which were assigned randomly during the study:
Control: 0% EOâ€“LPOS (C)
Whey protein coating (W)
Whey protein coating containing 5% LPOS (WL)
Whey protein coating containing 0.5% EO (WE)
Whey protein coating containing 5% LPOS and 0.5% EO (WLE).
